items.title: Neuroscientists Decipher Procrastination: A Brain Mechanism Explains Why People Leave Certain Tasks for Later
items.description: New research has discovered that a neural circuit may explain procrastination. Scientists were able to disrupt this connection using a drug.

items.title: Save Big on One of Our Favorite Desk Lamps from Lume Cube
items.description: Lume Cube has a variety of marked down lighting products to help revamp your home office.

items.title: AI’s Hacking Skills Are Approaching an ‘Inflection Point’
items.description: AI models are getting so good at finding vulnerabilities that some experts say the tech industry might need to rethink how software is built.
